question: Which city is to host the first ever counter-terrorism table-top exercise for the ‘Quad’ countries?
explanation: The National Investigation Agency is hosting the first counter-terrorism exercise for the \"Quad\" countries -- India, the US, Japan and Australia -- at the NIA headquarters in Delhi on November 21 and 22. The \"CT-TTX\" (counter-terrorism table-top exercise) is first such engagement among the Quad countries on regional and global issues of common interest and also in the domain of counter-terrorism and cooperation. It is being conducted as the partner countries have resolved to take the international counter-terror offensive, preparedness, mitigation and synergy to the next level and therefore the table-top exercise would be attended by CT (counter-terrorism) officials and security experts of the Quad countries.
